content: Hey team! Just wanted to check in on the Mobile App project progress. How are we doing with the authentication module?
Hi Sarah! The authentication is about 80% complete. I'm working on the password reset functionality and should have it done by end of week.
The UI mockups for the auth screens are ready for review. I've uploaded them to the shared drive.
Great work everyone on the E-commerce Platform! The client is very happy with the progress. Let's push for the beta release next week.
I've finished implementing the shopping cart functionality. Currently working on the payment integration with Stripe.
Quick reminder: We have the sprint planning meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Please come prepared with your task estimates.
I found a few minor bugs in the CRM system during testing. I'll create tickets for them in the issue tracker.
Thanks David! I'll prioritize fixing those bugs. Can you share the details in our project channel?
The new landing page design is complete! I think it looks much more modern and user-friendly. Feedback welcome!
Emily, the landing page looks fantastic! The color scheme and layout are exactly what we needed.
I can start implementing the frontend for the new landing page this afternoon. Should be straightforward with the designs Emily provided.
Team standup in 30 minutes! We'll review yesterday's progress and plan today's tasks. See you all in the meeting room.
The mobile app is ready for final testing! I'll run through all the test cases today and tomorrow. Launch is looking good for Friday!
Excellent news David! Make sure to test the edge cases we discussed. This is going to be a great launch! üöÄ
Great job everyone! Our team productivity has increased by 25% this quarter. Keep up the excellent work! üëè
